title: 340 - It’s Not Called Show-Friends
description: Schrab is comptrolling to prepare for his upcoming role as moderator of the Comic-Con Rick & Morty Panel. But Jeff’s still here, and without a podium, not-quite fitting into the seats on the stage. Listen now and gain the inside track on such topics as Jaws 4, Bees, and people who shower excessively: probably…
